language.name: English
settings.title: Settings
start.plot.0: As a passionate adventurer, I travel the world in search of dusty truths and hidden treasures.
start.plot.1: This time, my footsteps took me to the southern continent, where I heard that there was a hidden castle inhabited by a count hundreds of years ago. It was said that the count was a master of powerful magic, and he hid a great amount of treasures in the castle when he passed away.
start.plot.2: However, it is also very difficult to get these treasures. When I find that castle, there will be many traps waiting for me, and I will have to be extremely careful; missing an arm or a leg is no small thing.
start.plot.3: In addition, there are some difficult puzzles to solve in order to obtain these treasures, and many people give up at this point.
start.plot.4: Not only that, but the count had hidden the castle with his superior magic, and only by getting close to it could it be revealed. But I asked an old adventurer about the location of the castle early on, and finding it will not be a problem.
